name: 雙語教材教法（教）
comment: 請選修此門課的學生詳讀課程綱要之上課用書需求
description: 本課程旨在介紹雙語教學的定義及理念、語言使用、教學與評量、教學現場概況、以及實例分析。課程內容將以探討雙語教學的相關研究以及實際案例為主，期能發展中等教育階段師培生的雙語教學知能，增進其未來雙語教學的效能。
goals: 認識不同雙語教學法的核心理念與了解全球雙語教育實施概況。
認識英語為國際通用語的概念，發展跨語言教學知能。
提升教師授課語言及課室溝通與互動的效能。
根據課綱及學科內容、語言、認知能力及情境脈絡，設計雙與課程、教學活動及學習評量。

methodologies.note: Students will learn about various stages of bilingual education lesson design.
Students will discuss various strategies and materials to support bilingual education students.
Students will work in groups to create and present bilingual education materials.
Students will create bilingual education materials to supplement national curriculum materials in their subject.

grading.note: Weekly Exit Tickets: Students will complete a weekly exit ticket after each class to reflect on their learning.

Students will conduct a classroom observation in a bilingual classroom or interview a bilingual teacher and create a 10-minute video on the experience. Students will also be expected to watch and respond to the videos of 5 classmates.
[Groups] Students will present (1) a lesson plan, (2) supplementary materials for content and language learning, and (3) a bilingual assessment (20% each).
Final Reflection: Students will write a one-page reflection that describes what (a) what they learned, (b) how they will apply this learning, and (c) a reflection on future professional development.
